name: Planet babies
description:
Eat planets to get space babies.

W A S D to move, move mouse to move arm. R to restart.

You can feed both yourself or your babies. Babies grow faster.

Protect yourself at all cost. Creating a baby that is a bit bigger than yourself will turn the baby into the new you!
(This leaves a hand on the screen because I forgot to fix it!!!)

Oh yeah and avoid red weird glowing space rock things.

  • If the controls are not working, try refreshing
